name: Shoot That Box!
description:
Here is the south eleventh storage near the sea. It contains the package crossing from the countries and will be sorted for delivery to the destination. However, it seemed the workers missed a package here. Day by day, that abandoned box can act like a creature gradually. It can run, jump, and chase you. The night comes, and it is getting dark in the storage. You can't tell if that box wants to eat or play with you...

HOW TO PLAY

WASD →  Do the movement

RMB →  Shoot 

Move mouse around to aim

BGM from DOVA-SYNDROME
